messages.subject: re:doom/gloom extinction
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, Species have gone into extinction thousands of years before man, and I am not sure I believe everything I have read or have learned about that either. I
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
  Species have gone into extinction thousands of years before man, and I am not sure I believe everything I have read or have learned about that either. I find it interesting that most every modern day animal has a dinosaurs ancestor, and many dinosaurs can be compared to a modern day animal. Maybe ancient dinosaurs weren't as killed off as scientists have been proclaiming, but their bodies have adapted to the changing earth. Every scientific fact I have ever read is subjective, so I don't know how one can take that as positive proof about anything.
 
It does pain me to hear about all of the animals, plants, and water ways, etc. to be on the endangered lists, but more and more people are changing their outlook and taking it upon themselves to actually help.  My children, and every other child I know have so much knowledge these issues that I have great expectations for the future.
Wendy
